abstract: Paul Steiger, editor of non-profit Pro Publica, made $570,000 in 2008.
snippet: Paul Steiger, editor of non-profit Pro Publica, made $570,000 in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Writing at Reflections of a Newsosaur, Alan D. Mutter suggests that not all nonprofit journalistic models are created equal. In a piece posted on Tuesday, he compared Pro Publica, a robust, well-funded site in New York with a budget that will reach $9 million this year with Chi-Town Daily News, a boot-strapped enterprise that never reached its goal of $300,000 and laid off its staff of five this month.

headline.main: Nonprofit Journalism: Not Necessarily on the Cheap

abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis has been under pressure since striking an unpopular deal to purchase the investment bank Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Kenneth D. Lewis has been under pressure since striking an unpopular deal to purchase the investment bank Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Less than a year ago, Bank of America’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, celebrated his daring takeover of Merrill Lynch as the crowning triumph of a long career. On Wednesday, that conquest proved to be his downfall, as he announced his resignation after months of legal and political scrutiny over the star-crossed merger.

headline.main: Bank of America Chief to Depart at Year’s End
headline.print_headline: Ending Rocky Tenure, Chief Is to Leave Bank of America

byline.original: By Louise Story and Eric Dash

abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis, who will step down Jan. 1, has been under fire from the Securities and Exchange Commission and the attorney general of New York.
snippet: Kenneth D. Lewis, who will step down Jan. 1, has been under fire from the Securities and Exchange Commission and the attorney general of New York.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:19 p.m. Bank of America’s embattled chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, will step down effective Jan. 1, the bank said late Wednesday afternoon, capping months of turmoil and intense scrutiny over the bank’s ill-fated merger last fall with Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Lewis to Step Down as Bank of America’s Chief
